@graph.name: Optizen Blog Platform
@graph.description: Interactive blog management and content creation platform for Optizen users to publish, manage, and optimize blog content with advanced features.
@graph.browserRequirements: Requires modern web browser with JavaScript enabled

@graph.name: How to Use Optizen Blog Platform
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to creating and managing blog content using the Optizen platform

step.name: Access the blog platform
step.text: Navigate to the Optizen blog interface and log in to your account

step.name: Create new blog post
step.text: Click the create new post button and enter your content using the editor

step.name: Optimize and publish
step.text: Use built-in SEO tools to optimize your content and publish when ready

mainEntity.name: What browsers are supported by the Optizen blog platform?

acceptedAnswer.text: The platform supports all modern web browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge with JavaScript enabled.

mainEntity.name: Can I integrate the blog with social media platforms?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the platform includes built-in social sharing integration for major social media platforms.

mainEntity.name: Is the blog platform free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the basic blog platform features are available at no cost to users.
